body:
Since toxcore 17e8195a8f988a45b2822522bc7b967b3ebc3ca6 uTox (utox/utox@55b0222e30e7a0974ca1ca3ced229646b264cacd) aborts when it tries to restart toxcore. That is, when a setting changes (I toggle the UDP switch in advanced settings). The abort can be provoked 100% of the tries.

Here is what `utox -vvvv` outputs:
```
Toxcore:      Restarting Toxcore
Toxcore:      Using unencrypted save file
Toxcore:      Creating New Toxcore instance.
                IPv6 : 0
                UDP  : 1
                Proxy: 0 127.0.0.1 9050
Friend:       Initializing friend list.
Friend:       Initializing friend: 0
[…]
Friend:       Friendlist sucessfully initialized with 14 friends.
utox: /[…]/TokTok/c-toxcore/toxcore/logger.c:107: logger_write: Assertion `!"NULL logger not permitted"' failed.
Aborted (core dumped)
```

Here is an example of what I get in `dmesg`:
```
traps: utox[25996] general protection ip:7f2f5f44d7a8 sp:7f2f5ab46400 error:0 in libtoxcore.so.2.6.0[7f2f5f43d000+69000]
```

As a result, it is impossible to change any settings in uTox.

Is there anything that uTox can do, or is this a bug in toxcore only?

This is the line in uTox which leads to the abort: https://github.com/uTox/uTox/blob/55b0222e30e7a0974ca1ca3ced229646b264cacd/src/av/utox_av.c#L55

I don't know if other clients are affected.

comment_data.body: The commit you point at only changed a test, no toxcore production code. Are you sure that's the commit at which the crash started happening?

In fact, it wasn't. Now the earliest commit that I found is this: 064ffe58756f1adbd1917689ea79db95756d535e. I couldn't reproduce it at the commit one earlier than this, now. Maybe later it will work. It seems that the abort happens rarer the earlier the commit.
Thanks, that commit makes sense. Does it fail with current master? Can you provide a stack trace (gdb) for that?

Yes, it fails with current master (utox/utox@55b0222e30e7a0974ca1ca3ced229646b264cacd).

```
(gdb) bt full
#0  0x00007ff6371b7920 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:51

        pid = <optimized out>
        tid = <optimized out>
#1  0x00007ff6371b8ffd in __GI_abort () at abort.c:90

        act =
          {__sigaction_handler = {sa_handler = 0x7ff620001060, sa_sigaction = 0x7ff620001060}, sa_mask = {__val = {0, 0, 140695075557472, 93877637682560, 140695463529856, 0, 0, 0, 140695439455032, 140695439454864, 140695464585808, 21474836480, 880344120563138560, 0, 140695518679040, 140695516321065}}, sa_flags = 107, sa_restorer = 0x7ff63a459548 <__PRETTY_FUNCTION__.2417>}
        sigs = {__val = {32, 0 <repeats 15 times>}}
#2  0x00007ff6371b0147 in __assert_fail_base (fmt=<optimized out>, assertion=assertion@entry=0x7ff63a459529 "!\"NULL logger not permitted\"", file=file@entry=0x7ff63a4594e0 "[…]/TokTok/c-toxcore/toxcore/logger.c", line=line@entry=107, function=function@entry=0x7ff63a459548 <__PRETTY_FUNCTION__.2417> "logger_write")
    at assert.c:92
        str = 0x7ff620001060 ""
        total = 4096
#3  0x00007ff6371b01f2 in __GI___assert_fail (assertion=0x7ff63a459529 "!\"NULL logger not permitted\"", file=0x7ff63a4594e0 "[…]/TokTok/c-toxcore/toxcore/logger.c", line=107, function=0x7ff63a459548 <__PRETTY_FUNCTION__.2417> "logger_write") at assert.c:101
#4  0x00007ff63a412861 in logger_write () at /usr/local/lib64/libtoxcore.so.2
#5  0x00007ff63a44ec30 in msi_kill () at /usr/local/lib64/libtoxcore.so.2
#6  0x00007ff63a453ddc in toxav_kill () at /usr/local/lib64/libtoxcore.so.2
#7  0x00005561958043e4 in utox_av_ctrl_thread (UNUSED_args=0x0) at […]/avoidr/uTox/src/av/utox_av.c:55
        msg = 0x556195bd56b0 <toxav_msg>
        av = 0x7ff6281114d0
        call_count = 0
        audio_in = false
#8  0x00007ff639947568 in start_thread (arg=0x7ff635b0c700) at pthread_create.c:465
        pd = 0x7ff635b0c700
        now = <optimized out>
        unwind_buf =
              {cancel_jmp_buf = {{jmp_buf = {140695439460096, 7337533894261557514, 140724067165614, 140724067165615, 140695438409728, 140695439460096, -7334037973237151478, -7334011819423872758}, mask_was_saved = 0}}, priv = {pad = {0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0}, data = {prev = 0x0, cleanup = 0x0, canceltype = 0}}}
        not_first_call = <optimized out>
        pagesize_m1 = <optimized out>
        sp = <optimized out>
        freesize = <optimized out>
        __PRETTY_FUNCTION__ = "start_thread"
#9  0x00007ff63727752f in clone () at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:95
```
Thanks that's very useful. I'll look into it.
@avoidr can you recompile toxcore with debug symbols, so I can see which line in msi_kill is calling the logger, and so I can see the locals there?

```
(gdb) bt full
#0  0x00007f0d80751920 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:51
        set =
            {__val = {0, 139695942685296, 139695942690560, 139695966726340, 139698033754112, 139695556136736, 139695556136837, 139695556136736, 139695556136736, 139695556136883, 139695556137036, 139695556136736, 139695556137036, 0, 0, 0}}

        sigs = {__val = {32, 0 <repeats 15 times>}}

    at assert.c:92
        str = 0x7f0d68001060 ""
        total = 4096
#3  0x00007f0d8074a1f2 in __GI___assert_fail (assertion=0x7f0d839f5459 "!\"NULL logger not permitted\"", file=0x7f0d839f5410 "[…]/TokTok/c-toxcore/toxcore/logger.c", line=107, function=0x7f0d839f5478 <__PRETTY_FUNCTION__.2417> "logger_write") at assert.c:101
#4  0x00007f0d839ac8a1 in logger_write (log=0x0, level=LOGGER_LEVEL_DEBUG, file=0x7f0d839f7000 "[…]/TokTok/c-toxcore/toxav/msi.c", line=169, func=0x7f0d839f75b8 <__func__.6905> "msi_kill", format=0x7f0d839f70dc "Terminated session: %p") at /home/robert/Documents/Source_Code/git/TokTok/c-toxcore/toxcore/logger.c:107
        __PRETTY_FUNCTION__ = "logger_write"
        filename = 0x0
        msg = '\000' <repeats 312 times>...
        args = {{gp_offset = 0, fp_offset = 0, overflow_arg_area = 0x0, reg_save_area = 0x0}}
#5  0x00007f0d839eaa64 in msi_kill (session=0x7f0d70116710, log=0x0) at […]/TokTok/c-toxcore/toxav/msi.c:169

        call_count = 0

#8  0x00007f0d82ee1568 in start_thread (arg=0x7f0d7f0a6700) at pthread_create.c:465
        pd = 0x7f0d7f0a6700
        now = <optimized out>
        unwind_buf =
              {cancel_jmp_buf = {{jmp_buf = {139695942690560, 2362667920212334357, 140735868016750, 140735868016751, 139695941640192, 139695942690560, -2390531929476196587, -2390597588776151275}, mask_was_saved = 0}}, priv = {pad = {0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0}, data = {prev = 0x0, cleanup = 0x0, canceltype = 0}}}
```

Actually never mind, I see the passed logger is null. Thanks.
@avoidr can you try with #1154? It will still crash, but I want to know when.

```
(gdb) bt full
#0  0x00007fb73ee15920 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:51
        set =
            {__val = {0, 140424846964832, 140424846968576, 140425010964577, 140428178194432, 140424762195856, 140424762195957, 140424762195856, 140424762195856, 140424762196046, 140424762196156, 140424762195856, 140424762196156, 0, 0, 0}}

        save_stage = 2
        act =
          {__sigaction_handler = {sa_handler = 0x7fb730117f90, sa_sigaction = 0x7fb730117f90}, sa_mask = {__val = {0, 4294967295, 1, 94178167707952, 140425010998656, 0, 0, 0, 140424846965032, 140424846964864, 140425012054608, 21474836480, 9363270357826640896, 0, 140425066160128, 140425063802976}}, sa_flags = 533, sa_restorer = 0x7fb7420baa18 <__PRETTY_FUNCTION__.6249>}
        sigs = {__val = {32, 0 <repeats 15 times>}}
#2  0x00007fb73ee0e147 in __assert_fail_base (fmt=<optimized out>, assertion=assertion@entry=0x7fb7420ba860 "m->msi_packet == nullptr && \"Attempted to kill tox while toxav is still
alive\"", file=file@entry=0x7fb7420ba800 "[…]/TokTok/c-toxcore/toxcore/tox.c", line=line@entry=533, function=function@entry=0x7fb7420baa18 <__PRETTY_FUNCTION__.6249> "tox_kill") at assert.c:92
        str = 0x7fb730117f90 "\240\212\021\060\267\177"
        total = 4096
#3  0x00007fb73ee0e1f2 in __GI___assert_fail (assertion=0x7fb7420ba860 "m->msi_packet == nullptr && \"Attempted to kill tox while toxav is still alive\"", file=0x7fb7420ba800 "[…]/TokTok/c-toxcore/toxcore/tox.c", line=533, function=0x7fb7420baa18 <__PRETTY_FUNCTION__.6249> "tox_kill") at assert.c:101
#4  0x00007fb7420a8477 in tox_kill (tox=0x7fb730000d40) at […]/TokTok/c-toxcore/toxcore/tox.c:533

        time = 660842591717720
        av = 0x7fb730119480
        reconfig = true
        toxcore_init_err = 0
#6  0x00007fb7415a5568 in start_thread (arg=0x7fb7351f0700) at pthread_create.c:465
        pd = 0x7fb7351f0700
        now = <optimized out>
        unwind_buf =
              {cancel_jmp_buf = {{jmp_buf = {140424846968576, -7265985129093255897, 140733599641214, 140733599641215, 140424845918208, 140424846968576, 7225008796123278631, 7225053295461543207}, mask_was_saved = 0}}, priv = {pad = {0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0}, data = {prev = 0x0, cleanup = 0x0, canceltype = 0}}}

```
Thanks. It's a uTox bug. Can you file it there?

Booo, disappointing news.

So what is happening? What is uTox doing wrong? Perhaps you can comment on the new issue (https://github.com/uTox/uTox/issues/1280), whatever there is to say about this.

Thanks for your effort. I appreciate that you're so timely.

title: uTox aborts on toxcore restart
